HowItWorks.heading: How Stalela Works
HowItWorks.description: From your first form submission to ongoing compliance — here's what to expect with Stalela.
HowItWorks.imageAlt: Steps from business registration to ongoing compliance

01.title: Submit your details
01.description: Fill in your company details, director information, and upload the required documents. Stalela's guided form makes it simple — no jargon, no guesswork.
details: ID documents and proof of address
Signed mandate authorising us to act

02.title: We register your company
02.description: Stalela's team validates your information, prepares the submission, and files with CIPC on your behalf. You get updates at every step.

03.title: We keep you compliant
03.description: Once registered, Stalela sets up your compliance calendar. Annual returns, VAT, PAYE — we track deadlines and help you file on time.

04.title: You focus on your business
04.description: With registration complete and compliance managed, you can focus on growing your business while Stalela handles the admin.
details: Document vault for all your records
